医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
环境压力因素与胎儿大脑发育挑战有关《抗氧化剂》杂志上的评论文章探讨了环境因素对胎儿和新生儿大脑发育的影响，强调了来自母体压力源的炎症和氧化应激的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Environmental-stressors-linked-to-fetal-brain-development-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Environmental-stressors-linked-to-fetal-brain-development-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0add769d-291d-4cce-9571-9e506ba35292 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:52:00 -0400 Environmental stressors linked to fetal brain development challenges
俄勒冈州研究发现 mRNA 疫苗与年轻人心源性猝死之间没有明显联系俄勒冈州的研究发现 mRNA COVID-19 疫苗与 16-30 岁居民的心源性猝死之间没有明确的联系，在正在进行的公共卫生讨论中强调了疫苗的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Oregon-study-finds-no-clear-link- Between-mRNA-vaccines-and-sudden-cardiac-deaths-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Oregon-study-finds-no-clear-link- Between-mRNA-vaccines-and-sudden-cardiac-deaths-in-young-people.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77acb1d0-cd13-47d7-8ef2-8a5486c59730 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:38:00 -0400 Oregon study finds no clear link between mRNA vaccines and sudden cardiac deaths in young people
心力衰竭治疗的新进展有望改善患者的预后对心力衰竭治疗的全面回顾强调了治疗和诊断方面的重大进步，强调整合新药物和技术以改善患者的治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/New-advances-in-heart-failure-treatment-show-promise-in-improving-病人-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/New-advances-in-heart-failure-treatment-show-promise-in-improving-病人-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7809e989-42c4-4036-9533-af34bb502529 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:19:00 -0400 New advances in heart failure treatment show promise in improving patient outcomes
平衡饮食：研究揭示植物蛋白对美国人营养水平的影响研究调查了增加植物蛋白摄入量如何影响美国人的营养充足性，揭示了随着植物性饮食变得更加普遍，不同年龄段维生素和矿物质充足率的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Balancing-diets-study-reveals-plant- Proteins-impact-on- Nutrition-levels-in-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Balancing-diets-study-reveals-plant- Proteins-impact-on- Nutrition-levels-in-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=054a0f9e-09fb-4834-a142-baf8facdc86b Mon, 15 Apr 2024 23:04:00 -0400 Balancing diets: study reveals plant protein's impact on nutrient levels in Americans
研究显示具有广泛抗体反应的通用流感疫苗的潜力研究讨论了通用流感疫苗的潜力，强调了抗体广度和 Fc 受体 (FcR) 效应器功能在预防各种流感病毒株（包括具有大流行潜力的流感病毒株）方面的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-shows-pottial-for-universal-flu-vaccine-with-broad-antibody-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-shows-pottial-for-universal-flu-vaccine-with-broad-antibody-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbb439a6-2ab5-4c44-90b3-eec6de24aca0 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 20:52:00 -0400 Study shows potential for universal flu vaccine with broad antibody response
研究发现，烘焙绿茶可提高脑力任务表现研究调查了绿茶和烘焙绿茶的消费如何影响人类在精神任务中的反应，证明烘焙绿茶可以提高表现并减少疲劳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Roasted-green-tea-boosts-mental-task-performance-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Roasted-green-tea-boosts-mental-task-performance-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=450d595c-59cc-4598-beed-824138f25dae Mon, 15 Apr 2024 20:37:00 -0400 Roasted green tea boosts mental task performance, study finds
氯胺酮对抑郁症的快速影响与免疫系统途径有关研究揭示了氯胺酮对神经系统疾病具有强大的抗炎作用，显示出通过调节神经免疫途径治疗重度抑郁症的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Ketamines-rapid-impact-on-depression-linked-to-immune-system-pathways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Ketamines-rapid-impact-on-depression-linked-to-immune-system-pathways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e84a9a-004f-4900-b03f-8a0f42cd1f66 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 19:18:00 -0400 Ketamine's rapid impact on depression linked to immune system pathways
早期摄入豆类与幼儿更好的营养有关研究表明，食用豆类和扁豆等豆类的幼儿表现出改善的饮食质量，在生命的关键头两年显着增加了他们的营养摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Early-legume-intake-linked-to-better-nutrition-in-toddlers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Early-legume-intake-linked-to-better-nutrition-in-toddlers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdfa41cd-d22e-4d8c-87bc-92bd84191f46 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 19:07:00 -0400 Early legume intake linked to better nutrition in toddlers
基因工程皮肤细菌可对抗癌症在研究一种生活在每个人健康皮肤上的细菌时，斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员和一位同事可能偶然发现了一种强大的抗癌新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Genetically-engineering-skin-bacteria-to-fight-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Genetically-engineering-skin-bacteria-to-fight-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2905ad46-d072-4995-a93a-9359372d6274 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 15:44:31 -0400 Genetically engineering skin bacteria to fight cancer
了解 miRNA 对冠状动脉微栓塞后心肌细胞损伤的调节作用宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。冠状动脉微栓塞（CME）发生在急性冠状动脉综合征患者中，主要是由手术引起的动脉粥样硬化斑块破裂引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Understanding-regulatory-effects-of-miRNAs-on-myocardial-cell-injury-after-coronary-microembolization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Understanding-regulatory-effects-of-miRNAs-on-myocardial-cell-injury-after-coronary-microembolization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bf4a4c8-e903-44d7-9c6a-4e3a685b5195 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 14:06:00 -0400 Understanding regulatory effects of miRNAs on myocardial cell injury after coronary microembolization
